title: Locations

properties.name: description
properties.value: Locations are places that exist in the world map. The world map is divided into a number of realms, the largest of which is Gielinor. Realms are further divided into regions and kingdoms. Common types of locations include:

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Locations

Locations are places that exist in the world map. The world map is divided into a number of realms, the largest of which is Gielinor. Realms are further divided into regions and kingdoms. Common types of locations include:

  • Agility courses
  • Buildings
  • Settlements
  • Dungeons
  • Mines
  • Rivers
  • Mountains
  • Volcanoes
  • Realms
  • Islands
  • Hunter areas
  • Windmills
  • Woods
  • Regions

Contents

  • 1 Asgarnia
  • 2 Fremennik Province
  • 3 Great Kourend
  • 4 Kandarin
  • 5 Karamja
  • 6 Kebos Lowlands
  • 7 Kharidian Desert
  • 8 Misthalin
  • 9 Morytania
  • 10 Tirannwn
  • 11 Wilderness
  • 12 Other
  • 13 Unknown

rawContent:
{{external|rs}}
'''Locations''' are places that exist in the [[world map]]. The world map is divided into a number of [[realms]], the largest of which is [[Gielinor]]. Realms are further divided into [[region]]s and [[kingdom]]s. Common types of locations include:

* [[Agility course]]s
* [[Building]]s
* [[Settlement]]s
* [[Dungeon]]s
* [[Mine]]s
* [[River]]s
* [[Mountain]]s
* [[Volcano]]es
* [[Realm]]s
* [[Island]]s
* [[Hunter area]]s
* [[Windmill]]s
* [[Woods]]
* [[Region]]s
